desc: Bibbrella is your solution for messy feedings. Visit our website to shop our water-resistant, machine washable baby-led weaning bibs! Order now!

layout.text: Whether the mealtime forecast is a drizzle of cereal or a downpour of spaghetti, Bibbrella has you and your babe covered. With our truly full coverage bib, mealtime is a blast and cleanup is a breeze. Stress less over mealtime storms and enjoy more time with your family.
